dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 5060 IH: UAP Whistleblower Protection Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Burchett (for himself and Mrs. Luna) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform, and in addition to the Committees on Armed Services, and Intelligence (Permanent Select), for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

form.official-title: To provide whistleblower protections to Federal personnel for disclosing the use of Federal taxpayer funds to evaluate or research unidentified anomalous phenomenon material, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the UAP Whistleblower Protection Act.

section.header: Whistleblower protections for disclosures relating to the use of Federal taxpayer funds to evaluate or research unidentified anomalous phenomenon material

subsection.text: Section 2302(b)(8) of title 5, United States Code, is amended—

subparagraph.text: in clause (i), by striking or at the end;
in clause (ii), by striking the comma at the end and inserting , or; and
by inserting after clause (ii) the following:

clause.text: the use of Federal taxpayer funds to evaluate or research unidentified anomalous phenomenon material,

subparagraph.text: in clause (i), by striking or at the end; and
by inserting after clause (ii) the following:

clause.text: the use of Federal taxpayer funds to evaluate or research unidentified anomalous phenomenon material; or

subsection.text: Section 2303(a)(2) of title 5, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: in subparagraph (A), by striking or at the end;
in subparagraph (B), by striking the period and inserting ; or; and
by inserting after subparagraph (B) the following:

subparagraph.text: the use of Federal taxpayer funds to evaluate or research unidentified anomalous phenomenon material.

paragraph.text: Section 1034(c)(2) of title 10, United States Code, is amended by adding at the end the following:

subparagraph.text: The use of Federal taxpayer funds to evaluate or research unidentified anomalous phenomenon material.

paragraph.text: Section 4701(a)(1) of title 10, United States Code, is amended by adding at the end the following:

subparagraph.text: The use of Federal taxpayer funds to evaluate or research unidentified anomalous phenomenon material.

subsection.text: Section 4712(a)(1) of title 41, United States Code, is amended by inserting after a gross waste of Federal funds, the following; the use of Federal taxpayer funds to evaluate or research unidentified anomalous phenomenon material,.
Section 1104 of the National Security Act of 1947 (50 U.S.C. 3234) is amended—

subparagraph.text: in subparagraph (A), by striking or at the end;
in subparagraph (B), by inserting or after the semicolon; and
by inserting after subparagraph (B) the following:
the use of Federal taxpayer funds to evaluate or research unidentified anomalous phenomenon material;
in clause (i), by striking or at the end;
in clause (ii), by striking the semicolon at the end and inserting ; or; and
by inserting after clause (ii) the following:

clause.text: the use of Federal taxpayer funds to evaluate or research unidentified anomalous phenomenon material.
